Text: NYT Account Requesthave requested your ID and password for The New York Times on the Web Please follow the instructions below If you have any questions or problems write to Please DO NOT REPLY to this message Please make a note of your subscriber ID enronn Next to change the password for this account using your Web browser go to this unique URL guestsforgotforgotkey This page will allow you to choose a new password Make sure you have copied the address EXACTLY as it appears here If youre getting an Error page the address was probably entered incorrectly See Help With Copying and Pasting at the bottom of this email Follow the instructions on the screen to choose a new password After you have entered a password you will automatically enter our Web site The New York Times on the Web Customer Service Help With Copying and Pasting Using the mouse highlight the entire Web address eg guestsforgotforgotkey shown above in step Its essential to highlight the entire address even if it extends over two lines Under the Edit menu at the top of your screen select Copy Go into your Web browser open it if its not already opened Click in the Netsite or Address bar the place in your Web browser where it says what Web address youre currently looking at and delete the address thats currently there In the blank Netsite or Address bar paste the address by selecting the Edit menu at the top of your screen and choosing Paste Press Enter Follow the instructions to choose a new password If you did not request your ID and password for your NYT Web registration someone has mistakenly entered your email address when requesting their password Please simply ignore this message or if you wish you may go to the address above to select a new password for your account
